title: Ranbir Alia:There Are Several Mistakes, Soni Razdan And Mukesh Bhatt React To Ranbir-Alia's Viral Wedding Card
text:
A viral image of Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt's rumoured wedding in Udaipur has been doing the rounds on the internet. Reacting to the card, veteran film actor Soni Razdan and Alia Bhatt's mother called it a ‘non-issue’.

Soni Razdan spoke to Times Of India and said, “It’s a non-issue. Please, don’t give these miscreants more publicity than they deserve.”

The card that went viral on the internet had details of sagan ceremony of Alia with her boyfriend and actor Ranbir Kapoor on January 22, 2020.

But there were evident mistakes on the card, like Alia’s name was mispelled as ‘Aliya’ and mentioned her father’s name as ‘Mukesh Bhatt’. Mukesh, who is Mahesh’s brother and Alia’s uncle also reacted on the viral wedding card. He said,

“Alia is busy shooting for Sadak 2 in Ooty. I have got a call from all over the country inquiring about the same. How can it be real? It’s sad. There are so many mistakes on the card.”

Even Alia, who was spotted at the airport laughed off the wedding rumors and the news of viral card. Just a few days ago, Razdan had also rubbished the reports as saying,

“Look, it is sweet of all their fans to ask everything about them. I am Alia’s mother. I really do not want to talk about my daughter’s personal life. I want her to be happy. And she has my love and blessing on everything she does, beyond that I want her to live her life the way she wants to. As a mother, I do not give her any ‘gyaan’ because my Alia is very sensible as an individual."

Ranbir Kapoor, who has always stayed low-key on his private life is yet to make any comment on the 'rumored' wedding.
